description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary conditions no.2 (approved plans) and no.3 (materials), seeking to upgrade thermal resistance of existing external brick wall, in pursuant to planning permission reference  231019FUL dated 14/03/2024  for' Change of use of a single dwellinghouse (Use Class C3) into a large House in Multiple Occupation (HMO) comprising 8-bedrooms (Use Class Sui Generis); single storey and part-two storey rear extension (following demolition of existing extensions); alteration of main roof profile from hip to gable end; two storey side extension; associated internal and external alterations; provision of amenity space, cycle and refuse storage and off-street parking.
decision_conditions: The proposed development would introduce new items that would fall outside of the description of development of the original planning permission (231019FUL). As such, the proposal goes beyond the scope of Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
